name: Balance of Country
description:
Welcome to Country

Be careful where you place your buildings! Your Country is on top of a platform which will need to be kept balance!

How to play ?

You have to build houses to increase the population in your country.

You need to money to build! you have to build the structures to make money.

You need to keep the country balance while doing all this!
publishers: ZUUKS BILISIM HIZMETLERI SANAYI VE TICARET LIMITED SIRKETI
